turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there, I was looking to order a coffee from Starbucks in Port Huron, Michigan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking a caramel macchiato venti size with 2% milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a venti caramel macchiato with 2% and whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks in fort gratiot, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
